de.mixedfx.network.examples

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mixedfx.network.examples.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExampleUser

    public abstract class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
    A user shall represent a person. A user is identified world unique and ... After initializing the network connection and having a unique pid the instance of myUser is published to the other network participants.
    See Also:

      • equals

        public boolean equals(User user)
        This method is called after a User is received by the network. If a user is already in the network this method should return true. If this method returns false, the user will be kicked from the network. This implies that only the newest user is in the network and maybe not even him and there can't be a user twice.
        Parameters:
        user -
        Returns:
        Returns true if the user is equal to the other user, otherwise false.
